      public NoteAPI()

  • Method Details

    • isValidIndex

      public boolean isValidIndex(int index)
      This method takes in a number and checks if it is a valid index in the products ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      index - A number representing a potential index in the ArrayList.
      Returns:
      True of the index number passed is a valid index in the ArrayList, false otherwise.

    • add

      public boolean add(Note note)
      Add note object it is passed as a parameter to the arrayList.
      Parameters:
      note - models.Note object to be added into the arrayList.
      Returns:
      true if it was successful and false otherwise.

    • updateNote

      public boolean updateNote(int indexToUpdate, String noteTitle, int notePriority, String noteCategory)
      Update a models.Note in the ArrayList with the contents passed in the models.Note object parameter
      Parameters:
      indexToUpdate - Index of the note in the arrayList.
      noteTitle - Title of note.
      notePriority - Priority of the note.
      noteCategory - Category of the note.
      Returns:
      The status of the update if it worked true invalid input: '&' false otherwise.

    • deleteNote

      public Note deleteNote(int indexToDelete)
      Delete a note from the arrayList, if it exists, the index is passed as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      indexToDelete - Index of the note object in the arrayList.
      Returns:
      The deleted product object or null if no object is at the location.

    • archiveNote

      public boolean archiveNote(int indexToArchive)
      Archive a note in the arraylist of notes with index passed as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      indexToArchive - Index of the note object in the arrayList.
      Returns:
      The status of the Archive, True if it was successful or False if it was unsuccessful

    • archiveNotesWithAllItemsComplete

      public String archiveNotesWithAllItemsComplete()
      Archive all note in the arraylist if all items are completed.
      Returns:
      A string full of all notes that are archived.

    • numberOfNotes

      public int numberOfNotes()
      It will display the amount of notes in the system
      Returns:
      It will return an int of the size of notes.

    • numberOfArchivedNotes

      public int numberOfArchivedNotes()
      It will get the number of archived notes in the system.
      Returns:
      Return an int that has the amount of archived notes.

    • numberOfActiveNotes

      public int numberOfActiveNotes()
      It will get the number of activate notes in the system.
      Returns:
      return an int has the amount of activate notes.

    • numberOfNotesByCategory

      public int numberOfNotesByCategory(String category)
      A parameter of String is sent in of category in then check if valid category if it is then calculate how many notes of that category there is and returns it.
      Parameters:
      category - The category of which they are looking for.
      Returns:
      It return a number of notes by that category if not valid category return 0.

    • numberOfNotesByPriority

      public int numberOfNotesByPriority(int priority)
      It find all notes by a priority and send back number of notes by that priority.
      Parameters:
      priority - the priority parameter the person is looking for
      Returns:
      The number of priority that was found.

    • numberOfItems

      public int numberOfItems()
      This method returns the number of item objects stored in the ArrayList.
      Returns:
      An int value representing the number of items objects in the ArrayList.

    • numberOfCompleteItems

      public int numberOfCompleteItems()
      This method returns the number of completed items objects in the array list.
      Returns:
      An int value representing the number of completed items objects in the arraylist.

    • numberOfTodoItems

      public int numberOfTodoItems()
      This method returns the number of to do items objects in the array list.
      Returns:
      An int value representing the number of to do items objects in the arraylist.

    • listAllNotes

      public String listAllNotes()
      This method build and returns a String containing all notes in the arraylist. For each note stored in the arraylist , the index linked to the note is included. If no notes notes in the arraylist , the string that returned is "no notes stored"
      Returns:
      A string containing all the notes in the arrayList ot "no notes stored"

    • displayString

      public String displayString(int index)
      This is method that help with user experience it takes in a index and then will display. index of note ,note title, note priority , note archived , completion , and the items. It will make a string and make it look pretty.
      Parameters:
      index - this is index of the note
      Returns:
      It make a string of note invalid input: '&' items info e.g.index of note ,note title, note priority , note archived , completion , and the items.

    • displayString

      public String displayString(Note note)
      This is method that help with user experience it takes in a Note note and then will display. index of note ,note title, note priority , note archived , completion , and the items. It will make a string and make it look pretty.
      Parameters:
      note - this is a type Note which is sent in.
      Returns:
      It make a string of note invalid input: '&' items info e.g.index of note ,note title, note priority , note archived , completion , and the items.

    • listActiveNotes

      public String listActiveNotes()
      This method build and return a String containing all the activate notes in the arrayList. for each product note stored, the associated index is also included
      Returns:
      A string containing all the activate notes in the arrayList or "no active notes store"

    • listArchivedNotes

      public String listArchivedNotes()
      This method build and return a String containing all the archived notes in the arrayList. for each product note stored, the associated index is also included
      Returns:
      A string containing all the archived notes in the arrayList or "no archived notes store"

    • listNotesBySelectedCategory

      public String listNotesBySelectedCategory(String category)
      This method build and return a String containing all the Notes By Selected Category in the arrayList. A String category is sent in. for each note stored, the associated index is also included
      Parameters:
      category - this is String category looking for.
      Returns:
      A string containing all the Notes By Selected Category in the arrayList or "no notes stored " or "No notes with " +category"

    • listNotesBySelectedPriority

      public String listNotesBySelectedPriority(int priority)
      This method build and return a String containing all the Notes By Selected priority in the arrayList. A int priority is sent in. for each note stored, the associated index is also included
      Parameters:
      priority - this is int priority looking for.
      Returns:
      A string containing all the Notes By Selected priority in the arrayList or "no notes stored " or "No notes with " + priority "

    • listTodoItems

      public String listTodoItems()
      This method build and return a String all items that are to do in the arraylist.
      Returns:
      A string which contain all the todo items with note title and item.

    • listItemStatusByCategory

      public String listItemStatusByCategory(String category)
      This method build and return a String containing all the items by status (todo)/(complete) and category. A string category is sent in.
      Parameters:
      category - this is String by category looking for.
      Returns:
      A string containing all the TODO items and COMPLETE ITEMS along with number of completed and todo items.

    • findNote

      public Note findNote(int index)
      Find a note object at a specific index location If the index location is not valid it will return null.
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the Note object in the arrayList.
      Returns:
      The Note object or null if no object is at the index location.

    • searchNotesByTitle

      public String searchNotesByTitle(String searchString)
      It searches for a note by note title. A String searchString is sent in as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      searchString - A String search string is sent in as parameter invalid input: '&' what looking for in the note titles of the arrayList
      Returns:
      The notes found with that note title are built up and sent back as a String or if notes are empty "No notes stored" and if cant find any note tile matching "No notes found for: searchString"

    • searchItemByDescription

      public String searchItemByDescription(String searchString)
      The method search for item based on item Description. A string searchString is sent in as a parameter and is used to find the item Description.
      Parameters:
      searchString - Type String it used to find an item based on item description.
      Returns:
      A string is built and sent back with matching item description to the String sent in. If cant find any items matching the description "No items found for searchString" is sent back.

    • load

      public void load() throws Exception
      The load method uses the XStream component to read all the models.MessagePost objects from the posts.xml file stored on the hard disk. The read objects are loaded into the posts ArrayList
      Throws:
      Exception - An exception is thrown if an error occurred during the load e.g. a missing file.

    • save

      public void save() throws Exception
      The save method uses the XStream component to write all the objects in the posts ArrayList to the posts.xml file stored on the hard disk.
      Throws:
      Exception - An exception is thrown if an error occurred during the save e.g. drive is full.
